name: AI_Test_Case_Generation_Schema
description: Schema for AI-generated Polarion-compatible test cases. The AI must fill only the listed fields and ignore all others.

Title.description: Concise descriptive title summarizing the scope and objective of the test scenario.

ID.description: Unique identifier number or code for the test case.

Steps.description: List of ordered steps for executing the test case.

Step Description.description: Detailed description of the action to perform in this step.

Expected Result.description: Expected outcome after executing this step.

Test Group.description: Device category or family on which the test will be executed.

Channel.description: Channel or interface used to interact with the application under test (e.g., Web, App, IVR, Chatbot).

Device.description: Hardware device involved in the test (e.g., Smartphone, Laptop, Tablet).

Priority.description: Execution priority level for this test case.

Test Stage.description: Testing environment or stage where the test is executed (e.g., SIT, UAT, PREPROD).

Reference System.description: Functional area or application component under test.

Preconditions.description: Conditions or configurations required to execute the test case.

Execution Mode.description: Mode in which the test case will be executed.

Functionality.description: Specific functionality or feature covered by this test case.

Test Type.description: Main category of the test case.

No Regression Test.description: Indicates whether this test should be included in regression test suites.

Automation.description: Indicates whether this test should be considered for automation.

Dataset.description: Data required for test execution (e.g., specific user credentials, input files, environment data).

Expected Result.description: Overall expected result after all steps have been executed (final objective of the scenario).

Country.description: Geographical indication related to the specific application under test.

Type.description: Polarion element type (e.g., Test Case, Test Scenario).

Partial Coverage Description.description: Optional field describing any partial coverage of the functionality under test.

_polarion.description: Polarion ID(s) of related requirements, user stories, or test cases from which this test is derived.
